import { useState } from "react"; function MatchPoll(props) { const pollData = props.data const [show, setShow] = useState const handleError = (event) => { event.target.src = "https://www.fotmob.com/_next/static/media/team_fallback.3ae01170.png"; }; return (
{pollData?.oddspoll?.Facts?.[0]?.DefaultLabel}
{pollData?.oddspoll?.HomeTeam}
X
{pollData?.oddspoll?.AwayTeam}
) } export default MatchPoll
